class  ProfileInfo

Detailed Description

Class DataConnProfileManager manages and persists DataConnProfile objects.

Member Function Documentation

BOOLEAN DataConnProfileManager::AddProfile (  DataConnProfile &  dcp  ) 
 

Adds a new data connection profile. Adding a new data connection profile will assign a new ID to it and save it.

BOOLEAN DataConnProfileManager::AddTemporaryProfile (  DataConnProfile &  dcp  ) 
 

Adds a new, temporary data connection profile. Adding a new data connection profile will assign a new ID to it.

BOOLEAN DataConnProfileManager::AttachStorage (  DataConnProfileStorage *  storage  ) 
 

Attaches a data connection profile storage. This has to be done before persistent data connection profiles can be used. The data connection profile storage is responsible for storing data connection profiles, e.g. to the flash file system or to NVRAM. If you pass 0 then the currently attached storage, if any, gets closed and detached and TRUE is returned. If a valid storage is passed then the currently attached storage, if any, gets closed and the new one is opened and attached and the success of attaching is returned.

BOOLEAN DataConnProfileManager::DeleteProfile (  DataConnProfileId  id  ) 
 

Deletes a data connection profile.

DataConnProfileManager & DataConnProfileManager::Get (   )  [static]
 

Returns the reference to the data connection profile manager singleton.

DataConnProfileId DataConnProfileManager::GetCanonicalProfileId (  DataConnProfileId  id  )  [static]
 

Returns the canonical profile ID for the given profile id. This means, that for the invalid profile id the default profile ID is returned, otherwise the id itself is returned. Note, that if id is the invalid profile ID and no profiles are defined then the invalid profile ID is returned.

DataConnProfileId DataConnProfileManager::GetDefProfileId (   )  const
 

Returns the ID of the default data connection profile.

DataConnProfilePtr DataConnProfileManager::GetProfile (  DataConnProfileId &  id  ) 
 

Retrieves the data connection profile for the specified profile id. If the specified data connection profile id is the invalid one, then the default data connection profile is retrieved instead and argument id is set to its ID. The success of retrieving a data connection profile is returned.

Parameters:
id Profile ID of the data connection whose profile is to be retrieved. On success, id is set to the ID of the actually retrieved profile.
Returns:
A DataConnProfilePtr wrapping either a data connection profile or 0 on failure.

BOOLEAN DataConnProfileManager::GetProfileIdSet (  DataConnProfileIdSet &  pis  )  const
 

Retrieves the set of existing, non-temporary data connection profile IDs.

BOOLEAN DataConnProfileManager::GetProfileInfo (  DataConnProfileId  id,
ProfileInfo &  pi
) 
 

Retrieves information of a data connection profile.

BOOLEAN DataConnProfileManager::GetTemporaryProfileIdSet (  DataConnTempProfileIdSet &  pis  )  const
 

Retrieves the set of existing, temporary data connection profile IDs.

BOOLEAN DataConnProfileManager::IsTemporaryProfileId (  DataConnProfileId  id  )  const
 

Checks whether the given data connection profile id belongs to a valid temporary data connection profile or not.

BOOLEAN DataConnProfileManager::ResetToFactoryDefaults (   ) 
 

Restores persistent data connection profile settings to defined factory defaults. This method does not affect any currently existing temporary data connection profiles.

BOOLEAN DataConnProfileManager::SaveProfile (  const DataConnProfile &  dcp  ) 
 

Saves an existing connection profile.

BOOLEAN DataConnProfileManager::SetDefProfileId (  DataConnProfileId  id  ) 
 

Defines the default, non-temporary data connection profile ID.

BOOLEAN DataConnProfileManager::StorageIsAttached (   )  const [inline]
 

Tells if a data connection profile storage is attached.

BOOLEAN DataConnProfileManager::UpdateProfile (  DataConnProfile &  dcp  ) 
 

Updates the given data connection profile instance with the latest settings out of the profile storage.

Returns:
Tells if the given profile instance could be updated or not.
